|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.5 |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = outdoor, hg directional, high power |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = Compex |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 06/2014 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Compex WLE200N2-23 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9283; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is an outdoor access point / CPE. The datasheet would seem to indicate (it's assumed..) it is using an additional :wireless module ([[Compex WLE200N2-23]]) for the 2.4GHz band. Per '''[[Compex]]'''... *It's using the '''QCA''' QCA9342 (clocked @560MHz), :presumably AR9342 (noted as such in the datasheet) *It supports 24V PoE ===Blurb from Compex=== ''MMJ342 Plus is a high-performance Outdoor Access Point with integrated PoE. Using Qualcomm Atheros QCA9342 (560MHz) Processor,''
''MMJ342 Plus is dual-band high-speed product,it is built-in 17dBi@5GHz dual-polarization antenna and 7dBi@2.4G patterns for Dipole array antenna, best choice for bridge and coverage application''
''MMJ342 Plus has been integrated by radio 5GHz to achieve longer range as bride and 2.4Ghz as coverage The device is powerful, easy to handle, and also used in implementation over long distance by wireless ISP'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
